name: Asha Enterprises
description: COLD STORAGES, ICE PLANTS, CHILLING PLAN
overview:
We, “Asha Enterprises”, with our inception in the year 1976, at Pune, India, have been successfully established ourselves as pioneers in the Refrigeration Industry. Our organization manufactures, exports and supplies a superior range of Ammonia valves, Refrigeration Equipments, Asha Brand Compressors Spare Parts. This are available in various specifications, which are extensively used in different industries. Our range is checked on the various quality parameters and meets industry standards.We export our products to East Asia, Middle East, South East Asia and Indian Subcontinent.

Certification & Membership: Certification Name: BOG Member of ASHRAE Certification Name: Member of Association of Ammonia Refrigeration

Our Quality Standards: In order to ensure the high standards of offered Industrial valves and Refrigeration Equipments, our organization follows stringent quality policies, right from procurement to final stage of shipment. We source these valves, refrigeration and other products from the most trusted vendors of the industry who manufacture these in compliance with the established quality standards by using best grade raw material and components.

Management Team: We have a team of qualified and skilled professionals who are appointed after scrutinizing their industry knowledge and skills. Supported by their knowledge and dedication, we are able to carry out all the business processes in a hassle free manner and attain the higher level of patron satisfaction.

Our Products: Ammonia valves, Refrigeration Equipments, Asha Brand Compressors Spare Parts
